name: Algebra.IsIntegral.isIntegral
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_3
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : Ring A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
self : Algebra.IsIntegral R A
x : A
⊢ IsIntegral R x
decl:
/-- An algebra is integral if every element of the extension is integral over the base ring. -/
protected class Algebra.IsIntegral : Prop where
  isIntegral : ∀ x : A, IsIntegral R x

name: Algebra.isIntegral_def
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_3
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : Ring A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
⊢ Iff (Algebra.IsIntegral R A) (∀ (x : A), IsIntegral R x)
decl:
lemma Algebra.isIntegral_def : Algebra.IsIntegral R A ↔ ∀ x : A, IsIntegral R x :=
  ⟨fun ⟨h⟩ ↦ h, fun h ↦ ⟨h⟩⟩
